AIRLINE Ryanair is to start flying to Italy from Bournemouth Airport from today. 
From Thursday, December 22, the low-cost Irish airline has started a twice-weekly service to the Italian city of Ven… [+1750 chars]

articles.author: Jon Robinson
articles.title: Owner of Boujee restaurant owed over £3million when it collapsed - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: The company's Manchester site closed in October this year
articles.content:
The company behind the all-pink Boujee restaurant and bar in Manchester's Bridge Street owed over £3m when it collapsed into administration, it has been revealed.
